page.title: 04"Worship in Metheringham"
page.content: There are many opportunties for worship in Metheringham.Church of England,Methodist,Pentecostal and Roman Catholic services are held each week.Church of England-Rev.W.Bates. Services.8.00am.Holy communion(first Sunday)9.30am.Family service.6.00pm Evening Song.Methodist-Rev.R.Lowe. 10.30 morning worship(first Sunday family service)6.00 evening worship. Pentecostal-Pastor.A.Mann.Sunday 10.45am Breaking of Bread.2.30pm Sunday School.6.30pm Gospel Service. Tuesdays-7.00pm Bible Study.Thursday -7.00pm Prayer Meeting.Friday 6.30pm Sunshine Corner.Roman Catholic priests vary.6.00pm Saturday evening Mass Service held in the{Church of {England. }
